{"id":1112042452,"question_id":2868,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1701679930,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1112042452/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Continuous Subarrays","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public long continuousSubarrays(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n\n        TreeMap<Long, Long> map = new TreeMap<>();\n\n        int res= 0 ;\n\n\n        int st=0;\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            map.put((long)nums[i], map.getOrDefault((long)nums[i],0L)+1);\n\n            while(!map.isEmpty() && map.lastKey()-map.firstKey() >2){\n                 map.put((long)nums[st], map.getOrDefault((long)nums[st],0L)-1);\n                 if(map.get((long)nums[st])<=0)\n                    map.remove(nums[st]);\n            }\n\n            res+= (i-st+1);\n\n        }\n\n        return res;\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"continuous-subarrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
